meanings.definition: filles (noun): plural form of fille, meaning young girls
meanings.sent1: The filles played happily in the park.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of filles skipping rope together.
meanings.sent3: The little filles giggled as they chased each other around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a joyful swarm of filles.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dresses of the filles brightened up the playground.

meanings.definition: filles (verb): third person singular present of fill, meaning to put something into a space or container
meanings.sent1: She filles the jar with candies for the party.
meanings.sent2: Please filles the bucket with water from the well.
meanings.sent3: He filles the suitcase with clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent4: The chef filles the pastry with delicious cream.
meanings.sent5: The gardener filles the flowerpot with fresh soil for the plants.
